question: According to my understanding Yazid was the man who killed the grandson of the Prophet (s.a.w).Is this name therefore allowed?
answer:
QUESTION
I know of some muslims who are named Yazid. Considering the person who it is attributed to in Islamic history are we allowed to use this name as muslims?
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to keep the name Yazid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
